field.name: summary
field.value: Add a mechanism to mark constructors as unselectable for injection, much like DoNotWireAttribute is for property injection

field.name: description
field.value: I want to filter out constructors from injection similar to how properties are optionally easily filtered by adding an attribute.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: I'm just wondering whether re-using DoNotWire attribute for this scenaro wouldn't be a better option...

comment.author: rplaire
comment.text: It could be, but it is restricted to AttributeTarget.Property. I'd considered widening it, but "wire" seems out of place when it comes to constructors, especially since they have a heuristic applied to them which lends itself to being selected or not selected. It probably doesn't matter too much in the end, but I thought it was more clear just to make one specific to constructors.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: would you care to add that to the documentation?
